scripts.build: rm -rf dist && tsc && cp package.json dist/package.json
scripts.build-prod: rm -rf aot && node_modules/.bin/ngc -p tsconfig-aot.json && node_modules/.bin/ngc src && mv src/*ngfactory.ts aot && rm -r aot/waste && rm -r src/*.ngsummary.json
scripts.copy_static_files: cp -r package.json README.md LICENSE tsconfig.json typings.json typings dist/
scripts.copy_static_files_prod: cp -r package.json README.md LICENSE tsconfig.json aot/
